msbt.message: Are you gonna blow out the candles pretty soon?<10_4 /> You have to press  to do it
It's your show, , so make a wish and blow out the candles when you're ready. You have to get close and press  to do it.
I get it—you wanna really milk the suspense. But you have to blow out the candles at some point! Psst, you have to press  to blow them out

There's just something about you today I can't put my finger on it, but you seem zazzier than usual. It must be that birthday glow. Ugh! I wish I could bottle it. And trademark it. <10_4 />And sell it.
From the bottom of my heart, congratulations on another birthday, .
You know what you have to do on your birthday, right? <10_4 />Whatever you want! It's your birthday!
So what do you think of the special birthday decor? It's festive, right?If it were MY party, I'd do it a little differently. More strobe lights, for starters
You don't just get older on your birthday. You get coolerwiser and more collectible. Ha HA!
This is a little embarrassing, but it's actually my birthday today too.Oh, I meant embarrassing for you. Ha HA!
Did you know that it's my birthday today too? We're birthday buddies, ! It's our day on ! Let's live it up!
It must be cool to have your birthday on the first day of the year. Right, ? It's likeyou're the same age as the year! Orsomething.Well, at least you know everyone will be celebrating.
Wait, so your birthday only happens once every four years?!I hope you get four times as many gifts, !And I hope you only have to hear that joke once each year.
Yo, your birthday is literally the most exclusive one on the calendar!I'm gonna have to start telling folks that my birthday is Junevember 34th to one-up you. Ha HA!
It's pretty cool that your birthday is , you know?I'm something of an amateur numerologist, and the fact that this date is your birthday explains a lot.

What a wonderful time to have a birthday, !With the end of the year coming up, everyone's looking back and reflecting on their favorite memories. And I'm betting a lot of them include youand me, obviously.

Wow! Have you noticed that a lot of folks are feeling extra celebratory and, dare I say it, jolly today? I had no idea that your birthday was basically an island-wide holiday! Can we do that for mine too?
I can't wait to see you whack that piñata I hope it's filled with !
We handcrafted that piñata from artisanal papier-mâché and gold leaf. Go ahead and smash it, though!
Hit that piñata like it's a crosswalk button and there's a vintage on the other side!
